pullrequest.title: Fix Issue 2239: All links teleport to origin if model has a revolute2 joint.

content.raw:
I built gazebo 9 from this branch and then tried inserting a model with a revolute2 joint, but I still see all the links teleport to the center of the model when it is inserted.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1510175942-Peek_2018-10-17_18-00.gif)
content.html: I built gazebo 9 from this branch and then tried inserting a model with a revolute2 joint, but I still see all the links teleport to the center of the model when it is inserted.
